EmailTemplate.name: RE: Vender Registration Update (1335895185.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Vender Registration Update (1335895185.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Message - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Marc, I have not forgotten you J. I am working with my expense team to see if there is a way for Bruce to pay you directly and then write it off as an expense in the MBO system so you do not have to have the money flow through us at all. I had a meeting about this on Friday and I actually got an email this afternoon from our expense department letting us know the next steps. I am going to ask Steve Arhancet (Bruce’s contact at MBO) to reach out to Bruce and discuss what is need to substantiate paying your company as an expense. If we can set this up we feel it will be less risk for MBO and less hassle for Vision Machines. I also followed up on the MA “law.” It was never a law (I misspoke on that) it was a case study that our compliance department was looking at for reference. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Marc Landman [mailto:mlandman@vision-machines.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 01, 2012 11:32 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Vender Registration Update Hi Sara, Any progress on this yet?I would like to see the text of the law you were referring to that is of concern. Can you please send me a description, or a link to it? Thanks, Marc -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2012 3:15 PM To: Marc Landman Cc: Bruce Schulman (bruce@secure-a-lot.com <mailto:bruce@secure-a-lot.com>) Subject: RE: Vender Registration UpdateHi Marc, I am sorry I missed your call today. I did hear back on the results I will give you a ring shortly to discuss. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Marc Landman [mailto:mlandman@vision-machines.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Friday, April 20, 2012 1:03 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Vender Registration Update Hi Sara, Attached are W-2 and 941s for 2010. Marc-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2012 5:22 PM To: Marc Landman Subject: RE: Vender Registration UpdateHi Marc, Thanks so much for this additional info. May we see the W-2’s from the years he had W2 income from your SCorp. You would need this documentation to substantiate email below. We could also use a 941 if you have that as well. Thanks again,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Marc Landman [mailto:mlandman@vision-machines.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Monday, April 16, 2012 7:05 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Vender Registration Update Hi Sara, I have been operating Vision Machines since 1998 and have never had an IRS audit. I'm confident my business is in compliance with IRS regulations. You can speak with my accountant on this if you like. As an example, 2010 was a slow year due to the recession and gross profit was roughly 45,250. That year, my wages were 22,400 and distributions totalled $15,000. Business is currently improving and there is revenue over $37,000 for Q1 this year. Overall, I expect 2012 to be a better year and I will be paying myself fair wages as I did in 2010. I hope this addresses your concerns.Marc-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2012 6:29 PM To: Marc Landman Subject: RE: Vender Registration UpdateHi Marc, I apologize for the delayed response to this email. I have been working with supplier registration team and we have reviewed your account. The only glaring issue is that you have an S-Corp and are not currently paying yourself a wage and did not pay a wage to yourself in 2011. Is there anything you can provide me to prove that you will be taking a wage in 2012? It is very important to pay yourself a fair wage from your S-Corp, the IRS is really getting tough on this. I was just goggling about this(because I was curious as to why this was such an important issue to the supplier registration team) and I found this article that can point to what the team is referencing http://robergtaxsolutions.com/2011/02/sub-chapter-s-corporations-paying-yourself-enough/ Let me know if you can provide any type of proof you are going to be paying yourself and I will be happy to bring it by them for review. Thanks Marc,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Marc Landman [mailto:mlandman@vision-machines.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://robergtaxsolutions.com/2011/02/sub-chapter-s-corporations-paying-yourself-enough/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Monday, April 09, 2012 9:07 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Vender Registration Update I did not have any W-2 wages from Vision Machines in 2011. There should be typical wages in 2012, but I haven't taken them yet. Marc -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Friday, April 06, 2012 12:01 PM To: Marc Landman Subject: RE: Vender Registration UpdateHi Marc, They need to verify that you are paying yourself a fair wage from your s-corp. You can block out personal information such as SSN but they do need to see the gross W-2 amount paid out to you in 2011 and or a YTD paysub for 2012. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Marc Landman [mailto:mlandman@vision-machines.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2012 11:01 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Vender Registration Update Why do they need that? Vision Machines is a private company, and financials, including W-2s, should be private information. Marc-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2012 12:40 PM To: mlandman@vision-machines.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:mlandman@vision-machines.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdl1Yu0N76vK5NKD%2BljrON5WpuLR0B%2FL1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: Vender Registration UpdateHi Marc, Our vender registration compliance team is asking me for your W-2 from 2011. Could you send that over to me via email? Thank you!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
